description:
11.104 framestep
Select one frame every N-th frame.

This filter accepts the following option:
name: framestep

parameters.description: Select frame after every step frames. Allowed values are positive integers higher than 0. Default value is 1.
parameters.name: step

source:
11.104 framestep

Select one frame every N-th frame.

This filter accepts the following option:

step

Select frame after every step frames. Allowed values are positive integers higher than 0. Default value is 1.
